Trader Hally:
Welcome! Are you tired? You can rest there. What brings you here? Ah, you don't need to say. Yes, of course I know why people come to the Hunters' Village! People want to hunt... Am I right? Right?
This village is a home to various types of Hunters. Don't just stand there, come on over and check out the items. You may have mistaken me for one of those shopkeepers who stands all day, talking and talking, going on and on, about nothing at all...!
